titleStmt.title: The conquest of Granada by the Spaniards in two parts : acted at the Theatre Royall / written by John Dryden ...
Conquest of Granada by the Spaniards
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Almanzor and Almahide, or, The Conquest of Granada, the first part. The second part has special t.p.: Almanzor and Almahide, or, The conquest of Granada, the second part.
Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
"Of heroique playes, an essay": prefixed; "Defence of the epilogue, or, An essay on the dramatique poetry of the last age": p. [160]-175.
